text: Bill Taylor (born 3 June 1938) is a Scottish footballer, who played for St Johnstone, Stirling Albion, Partick Thistle and Luton Town. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Scottish footballers Category:Association football goalkeepers Category:St Johnstone F.C. players Category:Stirling Albion F.C. players Category:Partick Thistle F.C. players Category:Luton Town F.C. players Category:Scottish Football League players Category:English Football League players Category:Cumnock Juniors F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from Dumfries and Galloway
title: Bill Taylor (footballer, born 1938)
